country.title: Country
country.description: Country whose building typology will be used.

gross floor area.title: Gross floor area - external structure
gross floor area.description: Gross floor area of the building (external dimensions)

number of stories.title: Number of stories
number of stories.description: Number of stories of the building

building type.title: Building type
building type.description: MFH: Multi-family house; SFH: Single-family house; TH: Terraced house

construction year.title: Construction year
construction year.description: Year of construction to define the building class

set temperature for heating.title: Set temperature for heating
set temperature for heating.description: Temperature for when heating is activated

set temperature for cooling.title: Set temperature for cooling
set temperature for cooling.description: Temperature for when cooling is activated

month.title: Month
month.description: Month for calculation (not relevant if year is selected for model length)

model length.title: Model length
model length.description: Model length for calculation (Note: Calculation times are ~1min for month and ~12min for year)

roof type and orientation.title: Roof type and orientation
roof type and orientation.description: 0: gable roof, north/south orientation; 1: gable roof, east/west orientation; 2: skillion roof, north orientation; 3: skillion roof, east orientation; 4: skillion roof, south orientation; 5: skillion roof, west orientation; 6: flat roof, horizontal orientation

roof pitch.title: Roof pitch (degrees)
roof pitch.description: Angle of roof (if flat roof type is selected, roof pitch will automatically be 0 degrees

wall to floor ratio.title: Wall to floor ratio
wall to floor ratio.description: Ratio of wall area to gross floor area

building ratio length.title: Length for building shape ratio (length:width)
building ratio length.description: Length for building length to width ratio (length/width), where the facade side is a width side. Note: Corresponds to next option

building ratio width.title: Width for building shape ratio (length:width)
building ratio width.description: Width for building length to width ratio (length/width), where the facade side a width side. Note: Corresponds to previous option

area of front facing windows.title: Area of front-facing windows (as % of wall)
area of front facing windows.description: Percentage of wall that is covered by windows on the facade side wall

area of rear facing windows.title: Area of rear-facing windows (as % of wall)
area of rear facing windows.description: Percentage of wall that is covered by windows on the back side wall

area of side 1 windows.title: Area of left side windows (as % of wall)
area of side 1 windows.description: Percentage of wall that is covered by windows for left side wall

area of side 2 windows.title: Area of right side windows (as % of wall)
area of side 2 windows.description: Percentage of wall that is covered by windows for right side wall
